Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2016 04:15AM pari143 wrote: hi dear Sabrina My sister have similar conditions like u .she have some swelling in her left breast and some stabbing pain which come and go she got her ultrasound sound thank God there's nothing but the radiologist recommended 3d ultrasound because of her dense breasts .we r worried for her and she is afraid we r stressing her for 3d ultrasound sound .I pray that the result will show nothing .I suggest u to have an ultrasound .I hope and pray for u that all goes well and there will be nothing for u to worried .lots of hugs God bless u

Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2017 10:16PM pari143 wrote: Dear jen First of all I am sorry that u r joining us in here . This is a great board where people share their own experience with one another. My mom was diagnosed on 2012 at her initial test they found a small nodule in her lung but after a CT the mass turn out to be a non cancerous noudle. Try to calm ur self I hope and pray that ur test comes back as clear . Sending u hugs
